Inventors: GAO AIHUA; 高爱华; YAN FUJIE; 闫富杰; HUANG KEYI; 黄克毅; ZHANG QIANQIAN; 张倩倩; CHANG XINGTAO; 常兴涛; LIU YINGXU; 刘迎旭; SHEN SHUQIANG; 申书强; GUO SAIYA; 郭赛雅; GUO HONGXIN; 郭红欣; XIAO WENSHUAI; 肖文帅; LI SHENG; 李升

Title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR TREATING ORGANIC WASTE
Abstract: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a method and apparatus for treating organic waste capable of suppressing generation of malodor, not generating environment pollution, forming environment wherein microorganisms are able to treat the organic waste in good condition and to manufacture a lot of high quality compost in a short period.SOLUTION: The apparatus for treating organic waste is provided with a hermetically closed structure fermentation tank 2 wherein a fermentation treatment is performed by charging a mixture 4 agitated and mixed of return materials of the organic waste treated by microorganisms with green base materials of the organic waste to be processed, and a semi-closed system air supply and discharge circulation mechanism 3 wherein, after the organic waste is fermented by supplying air into the fermentation tank 2, gas generated by fermentation is exhausted, a part of the exhausted gas is treated for deodorizing, and the residual gas together with the introduced air are sent to the fermentation tank 2.COPYRIGHT: (C)2003,JPO
Applicants: RIBAASU KK; 株式会社和
Inventors: HOTSU ISAO; 保津　勲; MATSUDA HIDEMICHI; 松田　秀道

Title: 一种基于农业废弃物发酵堆肥的发酵槽
Abstract: 本发明公开了一种基于农业废弃物发酵堆肥的发酵槽，包括发酵槽本体，所述发酵槽本体的顶部设置有密封盖，所述密封盖的顶部固定安装有排气净化组件，所述发酵槽本体的左侧上端固定安装有注氧组件，所述发酵槽本体的内部转动安装有转轴，所述转轴的表面固定安装有搅拌叶片，所述发酵槽本体内部底端转动安装有排料绞龙，所述发酵槽本体的左侧活动安装有驱动电机，所述驱动电机的右侧固定安装有驱动力转换组件。本发明采用上述结构，利用底板顶部设置的液压缸能够便于将发酵槽本本体的一端进行抬升，利用驱动力转化组件使驱动电机驱动排料绞龙能够将发酵原料排出，从而能够便于进行下料，便于进行清理。
Applicants: NINGXIA UNIVERSITY; 宁夏大学
Inventors: GUO YONGCHUAN; 郭永川; ZHANG XUEYAN; 张雪艳; MA TINGTING; 马婷婷; LUO YANXIN; 罗雁馨; WANG XINYI; 王欣怡; ZHANG QIANNAN; 张倩男

Title: 一种自由转弯的翻堆机
Abstract: 本实用新型公开了一种自由转弯的翻堆机，包括车架，在车架的左右两侧各设置有前轮和后轮，前轮和后轮分别安装到前轮支架和后轮支架上，前轮支架和后轮支架均可旋转地安装到车架上，在前轮支架和后轮支架上均安有传动手柄，传动手柄与传动机构相连，在左右两侧的前轮和/或后轮上安有轮驱动机构。该车架采用车轮驱动，并能够进行大角度的自由转弯，用该车架制作的翻堆机，可以极大提高转弯性能，给使用带来方便。
Applicants: HAO WEI
Inventors: LIU JIANZHONG; SUN PENGDA

Title: 一种有机肥堆肥处理方法
Abstract: 本发明公开了一种有机肥堆肥处理方法，其步骤包括：步骤：控制电动推杆的伸缩杆伸缩带动支撑块竖向移动，支撑块固定支撑杆，支撑杆的下侧一端固定T形杆，T形杆的横杆一侧固定一组均匀排布的固定轴，套环环套所述固定轴，每个所述套环的一端分别固定限位轴的一端，每个所述限位轴分别固定一组均匀排布的搅拌齿，支撑块移动会带动支撑杆移动，支撑杆带动T形杆移动，T形杆带动固定轴、搅拌齿移动，支撑块带动横杆、连接杆、直槽杆、规整板、固定板、方板、连杆和移动杆等移动，调节搅拌齿和规整板等的高度。本发明涉及有机肥堆肥方法领域，具体地讲，涉及一种有机肥堆肥处理方法，方便进行有机肥堆肥。
Applicants: JIANGSU WONYOU BIOTECHNOLOGY CO., LTD.; 江苏沃友生物科技有限公司
Inventors: WANG DAN; 王丹; HU JIN; 胡进; WANG YONG; 王勇

Title: 一种堆肥翻耙设备
Abstract: 本发明公开了一种堆肥翻耙设备，安装在条形发酵槽长度方向的两侧平行的墙体上，包括机架主体、翻耙机构、动力传动机构、行走机构、电气控制系统和输电系统，其中电气控制系统和输电系统远程控制整个翻耙设备的运作，动力传动机构带动翻耙机构和行走机构转动，行走机构的转动带动翻耙设备在发酵槽内往返运动。本发明实施的翻耙设备结构简单，制造成本低，尤其适用于中小型养殖业的发酵物料翻动。
Applicants: CHANGZHOU YOUAISI ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION TECHNOLOGY CO., LTD.; 常州优艾斯环保科技有限公司
Inventors: YIN YONGHONG; 尹永红

Title: 一种生物有机肥生产用腐熟装置
Abstract: 本实用新型公开的属于生物有机肥生产技术领域，具体为一种生物有机肥生产用腐熟装置，包括开口向下的U型支撑架，所述U型支撑架顶部横杆中央位置套接有活动环，所述活动环右侧焊接有支撑柱，所述支撑柱右侧螺接有罐体，所述罐体外壁右侧套接有支撑环，所述支撑环底部铰接有液压缸，所述罐体内腔横向设置有增氧管，所述增氧管外壁均匀开设有通孔，所述罐体底部前后两侧均匀横向螺接有第二安装架，所述电机顶部动力输出端连接有转轴，所述转轴顶部贯穿罐体，所述转轴外壁均匀焊接有搅拌叶，本新型方案可以保证原料与菌种混合均匀，在腐熟过程中可以对原料进行供氧，保证产品质量，同时降低操作人员的劳动强度，有效提高工作效率。
Applicants: XUZHOU HANCHENG BIOENGINEERING CO., LTD.; 徐州汉承生物工程有限公司
Inventors: FU XUEGANG; 付雪刚; ZONG YING; 宗莹

Title: 一种用于槽式翻抛机的行走机构
Abstract: 本实用新型公开了一种用于槽式翻抛机的行走机构，包括发酵池、翻抛机体、齿轮、齿板、滑块、移动行走轮和辅助轮，所述翻抛机体上安装有转盘，所述转盘上安装有旋转把手，所述转盘上安装有转杆，所述转杆上安装有齿轮，所述齿轮与凸齿啮合，所述凸齿安装在齿板上，所述轮轴上安装有移动行走轮，所述翻抛机体内安装有滑杆，所述齿板上安装有连接杆，所述连接杆上安装有滑块，所所述翻抛机体上安装有安装板，所述安装板之间安装有轴心，所述轴心上安装有辅助轮，本实用新型，可以满足不同宽度的发酵池作业，操作简单，使用灵活方便，可有效避免翻抛机体左右晃动，杜绝因晃动导致滚轮脱离导轨而耽误工时，使翻抛机体的行进更加顺畅。
Applicants: SHIJIAZHUANG NAHAI MACHINERY MANUFACTURING CO., LTD.; 石家庄纳海机械制造有限公司
Inventors: BAO RUIKE; 鲍风险; ZHAI WEI; 翟炜; ZHANG ZHUOYUE; 张卓越

Title: 一种有机肥链板式发酵翻堆自动出料机
Abstract: 一种有机肥链板式发酵翻堆自动出料机，其特征在于，包括翻堆机本体和移位机本体，所述翻推机本体设置大车架，所述大车架的上端设置液压缸，所述液压缸连接链板支撑架，所述链板支撑架整体架构为L型，较短边的上端设置减速机，较长边设置链板，所述较长边与较短边的相交处设置有转轴，所述转轴设置于大车架的上端，所述移位机主体与大车架顺向的两端设置有移位架，所述移位机之间设置有传输装置。本发明的翻堆机将物料传输到传输装置上，传输装置将物料传送到指定位置，实现了发酵池内物料的自动出料。
Applicants: QINGDAO JINYUELONG MACHINERY CO., LTD.; 青岛金越隆机械有限公司
Inventors: YU SONGHAI; 于松海

Title: 具有破碎和喷淋功能的高效翻抛机
Abstract: 本实用新型公开了一种具有破碎和喷淋功能的高效翻抛机，所述行走轮活动安装在托架上，所述行走电机固定安装在托架上，行走电机与行走轮传动连接，所述提升输送机构由输送辊轮、输送带、支架、刮板和提升电机构成，所述支架固定安装在托架的底部，所述输送辊轮呈倾斜状呈排活动安装在支架上，所述提升电机固定安装在托架上，提升电机与输送辊轮传动连接，所述输送带绕置在呈排的输送辊轮上，所述刮板呈排固定安装在输送带上，所述破碎机构由导料筒、破碎架和破碎电机构成，本实用新型优点是：将物料进行充分的破碎细化，避免了物料结块现象的发生，显著提升了翻抛效率和物料发酵效果。
Applicants: ZHONGKE MEIDA (YICHANG) ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION TECHNOLOGY CO., LTD.; 中科美大（宜昌）环保科技有限公司
Inventors: ZHAN DINGYONG; 占定勇; SONG XIAOQING; 宋小青

Title: PORTABLE TOILET
Abstract: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To prevent a portable toilet from being easily tumbled by a load applied to armrests of the portable toilet. SOLUTION: The portable toilet is provided with a stool seat 2 having an upper opening on which the hip is placed, a base part 3 having an inner base part of a stirring tank for receiving fine power of vegetable composition and aerobic ferment, and an base part providing a designed cover and armrests 8 fixed to supports 6a, 6b mounted to the upper part of the base part 3. The supports 6a, 6b having the armrests 8 fixed thereto are arranged in the region from the caster axis X to the position of the center of gravity of the whole portable toilet so that a portion of the weight of the human body does not constitute a turning force or inclining force to tumble down the portable toilet, but keeps the stable condition.COPYRIGHT: (C)1998,JPO
Applicants: TOYODA GOSEI CO LTD; 豊田合成株式会社
Inventors: SATO TAKAHIRO; 佐藤　高宏; ISHIDA SHUICHI; 石田　修一; IWATA RYUJI; 岩田　龍治

Title: 一种好氧发酵机阻旋系统
Abstract: 本实用新型涉及生物技术，更具体地说，是一种好氧发酵机阻旋系统，包括发酵机罐体和阻旋部件，所述发酵机罐体的内部安装有搅拌轴，搅拌轴上分布有搅拌翅，发酵机罐体的外侧壁安装有法兰，阻旋部件安装在发酵机罐体的内侧壁上，通过设置阻旋翅，在搅拌物料时，利用搅拌翅搅动物料，在阻旋翅的配合下，对物料施加剪切力，对物料进行切割，防止物料粘结，大大提高了搅拌效率，有助于物料的后续发酵，解决了现有的发酵机在搅拌物料时，物料容易粘结在一起，搅拌不够均匀的问题。
Applicants: SHANDONG OUFEILONG MECHANICAL CO., LTD.; 山东欧菲龙机械有限公司
Inventors: GAO YUDA; 高玉达; LIU GUOLIN; 刘国林; ZHAO GUANGJIN; 赵广金

Title: 厌氧发酵装置
Abstract: 本实用新型涉及一种厌氧消化工艺的污水的生物处理，特别是一种厌氧发酵装置，其结构要点为：包括发酵前槽、发酵后槽、进水装置和出水装置，发酵前槽具有前槽进口和前槽出口，前槽进口与进水装置连接，发酵后槽具有复数个串联的槽体，各槽体分别具有后槽进口和后槽出口，各槽体的后槽进口和后槽出口为上下及左右交错的方式分布在槽体侧壁上，且相邻两槽体的后槽出口与后槽进口对应分布并连通，发酵前槽的前槽出口与发酵后槽前端槽体的后槽进口连接，发酵后槽末端槽体的后槽出口与出水装置连接。具有有机污染物降解效果好，污水滞留期短，发酵池容积小，容积利用率高的特点。
Applicants: 张冲
Inventors: 张冲; 张华

Title: DECOMPOSING DEVICE OF STIRRING LIVESTOCK MANURE FOR STALL IN WHICH DOMESTIC ANIMALS CAN RESIDE
Abstract: The present invention relates to a decomposing device of stirring livestock manure for a stall in which domestic animals can reside, and more specifically, to a decomposing device of stirring livestock manure for a stall in which domestic animals can reside, which is connected to a power moving device such as an agricultural machine, extends a use period of livestock manure by spraying microorganisms to the same, regularly stirring and decomposing the livestock manure, and supplies the decomposed livestock manure as compost. The decomposing device is composed of a power means and a movement means, wherein power of an engine is connected to a power connection shaft through a belt, a cylinder connector is installed on an upper side at the center of a reinforcement bar connecting connection blocks to connect a control cylinder, and the decomposing device is connected with the power moving device of which connection bars are rotatably connected at regular intervals on both sides of the reinforcement bar via a connection means. The decomposing device includes: a spray means; a stirring means; and a floor flattening means. The spray means includes: a spray pipe installed on an upper side or a lower side of the reinforcement bar connecting the connection blocks at both sides; a screw shaft connected to the spray pipe, wherein the screw shaft passes through a connection hole and is fixed by a screw; and nozzles installed at regular intervals on the spray pipe, supplying microorganisms in a microorganism tank and spraying the microorganisms onto the floor. The stirring means includes: connection plates installed at regular intervals on a stirring shaft connected to a power connection shaft rotatably connected to the power means; and stirring wings having front ends formed in different directions and connected to the connection plates such that the stirring blades stir livestock manure and rice husks or straw litter from bottom to top while rotating. The floor flattening means includes: height adjusting plates installed on both lower sides of the connection blocks; and flattening plates obliquely installed on lower sides of the height adjusting plates and performing stirring while moving on the floor. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2022
Applicants: 강원도 횡성군; 김영석
Inventors: KIM, YOUNG SEOK; HWANG WON GYU; SEO SEONG HUI; 김영석; 황원규; 서성희

Title: 一种污泥好氧发酵处理设备
Abstract: 本实用新型公开了污泥处理技术领域的一种污泥好氧发酵处理设备，包括罐体，罐体为圆柱状，罐体的左侧壁内部开设有第一安装槽，罐体的顶壁内部开设有第二安装槽，且第一安装槽的顶部槽腔与第二安装槽的左部槽腔相连通，罐体的底部内腔中安装有转杆，且转杆杆体的左右两端分别贯穿罐体的左右两壁，罐体的底部左侧外壁固定安装有第一安装板，第一安装板的顶壁固定安装有电机，电机的输出端与转杆的左端杆体相连接，本实用新型通过电机带动转杆，转杆带动搅拌杆旋转，可以对罐体内的污泥进行翻转，增加污泥与氧气的接触面积，有益于提高发酵效果，通过联动带动第二连接杆转动，同时使刮板在罐体内转动，可去除罐体内壁粘附的污泥。
Applicants: CHINAIR ENVIR SCI-TECH CO., LTD.; 南京清元景和环境科技有限公司
Inventors: YANG GUANGPING; 杨广平; SUN ZHONGSEN; 孙中森

Title: Mobile Müllkompostieranlage in Containerform für die Hausbiomüllentsorgung
Abstract: The side loader container is equipped section-wise with bio-waste containers (contents approximately 1100 litres) and after complete filling to approximately 40 cubic metres is taken to a collecting location, where the waste is subjected to a further rotting process. The seepage water coming from the rotting process is collected in the container itself and is fed to the system for humidification purposes. A supply with electrical energy for ventilation, changing over the substrate and monitoring the rotting process by means of sensors is ensured by solar technique in combination with energy accumulators. The turnover of the bio waste is achieved with the aid of a vertical worm. This stops putrefaction processes and at the same time mixes in necessary, additional substrate homogeneously. USE/ADVANTAGE - To compost domestic organic waste.
Applicants: KOHLMETZ BERND; HINGST K P DIPL ING
Inventors: KOHLMETZ BERND; HINGST K P DIPL ING

Title: TRAY BOOKLET FOR SMOKABLES, ROLLING PAPER HOLDER AND ASSEMBLY
Abstract: An assembly of a tray booklet (1) and rolling paper holder (100), the individual booklet (1) and individual rolling paper holder (100). The booklet (1) is suitable for smokables comprising a compostable cover body (5) comprising a sheet (6) defining an inner surface (10, 31) and an outer surface (12), and smoking paraphernalia (7) arranged on the inner surface (10, 31). The sheet (6) is provided with first lines (11) of weakness (107, 11, 13, 21) for the cover body (5) to fold (201) along from an open configuration into a closed (X9) configuration and vice versa. In the closed (X9) configuration the sheet (6) encloses the smoking paraphernalia (7). In the open configuration the smoking paraphernalia (7) are uncovered. The sheet (6) is provided with at least one second line of weakness (107, 11, 13, 21) for the body (5) to fold (201) along from an open configuration into a channel (15) configuration and vice versa. In the channel (15) configuration the sheet (6) forms a first and a second upstanding ondulation (19) defining a holding channel (15) therebetween for holding the smokables. The rolling paper holder (100) is folded from a single sheet cutout (101) such that the holder (100) defines an inner volume for holding trapezoid rolling papers (200) therein in a stack (202). The cutout (101) comprises lines (11) of weakness (107, 11, 13, 21) arranged such that they define a plurality of trapezoid areas (105.1) and along which lines (11) of weakness (107, 11, 13, 21) the cutout (101) is folded into the holder (100). The plurality of trapezoid areas (105.1) comprises a trapezoid outlet provided with a slit (109) for allowing a rolling paper closest to the outlet area (105.1) to be removed from the stack (202) therethrough, and a trapezoid base forming a base of the holder (100) opposite the trapezoid outlet area (105.1).
Applicants: THE NEW WAYS B.V.
Inventors: SINGH, Rajdip

Title: 一种高稳定性龙门架
Abstract: 本实用新型属于污泥好氧发酵应用技术领域，具体公开了一种高稳定性龙门架，包括横条形角钢、横固定框板、竖支撑腿、斜支撑板、第一横支撑板、第二横支撑板、辅助竖支撑腿、V形支撑板、辅助斜支撑板、爬梯和爬梯护栏等。本实用新型的一种高稳定性龙门架的有益效果在于：其结构设计合理，使用时横跨在发酵槽上，保证与其相配合使用的覆膜/收膜部件、移动部件等完成可靠、稳定和安全的覆膜/收膜动作，同时整体框架结构支撑韧性强，使用寿命长，实用性强。
Applicants: WUXI AIDDY PRECISION MECHANICAL CO., LTD.; 无锡艾迪玛精密机械有限公司
Inventors: YU ZHECHENG; 郁哲诚; SUN JIANRONG; 孙建荣; XU CHANG; 徐畅; YU WEIMIN; 郁维民

Title: 一种牛初乳含乳片有氧发酵用罐体压强监测装置
Abstract: 本实用新型公开了一种牛初乳含乳片有氧发酵用罐体压强监测装置，包括：发酵组件，所述发酵组件包括发酵罐、把手、万向轮、U型管和连管；测压组件，所述测压组件包括压力表、显示屏、压力管、管体、螺纹管、螺帽、第一密封圈。本实用新型安装压力表时，首先通过螺纹管与连管相连通，固定旋转压力表，使压力表处于方便观测的位置，一只手握住第二防滑套，另一只手握住第一防滑套，旋转第二防滑套，由于压力管和管体通过外螺纹与内套环螺纹连接，压力管和管体外侧壁的外螺纹互为反向设置，使得压力管和管体相对移动，挤压第一密封圈和第二密封圈，从而固定压力表的朝向，牛初乳含乳片发酵时，方便工作人员对压力表的数值进行记录。
Applicants: INNER MONGOLIA CAOYUAN HONGNIU BIOTECHNOLOGY CO., LTD.; 内蒙古草原红牛生物科技有限公司
Inventors: LIU QIN; 刘琴

Title: 一种翻抛机的滚筒固定机构
Abstract: 本实用新型提供了一种翻抛机的滚筒固定机构，包括转动轴以及翻抛滚筒，所述转动轴穿过翻抛滚筒的内部，且使转动轴的两端向外延伸至所述翻抛滚筒的外侧；所述转动轴的中间位置固设有一第一固定片；所述转动轴在对应所述翻抛滚筒两侧的端部处各设置有一第二固定片；所述转动轴在所述第一固定片与第二固定片之间的位置处均设置有一第三固定片；所述第一固定片、第二固定片以及第三固定片均与所述翻抛滚筒固定连接。本实用新型优点：可使转动轴与翻抛滚筒形成一个整体，能够极大的增强转动轴与翻抛滚筒之间的连接强度，以有效避免发生翻抛滚筒与转动轴脱开的情况。
Applicants: FUJIAN NONGKE NONGYE DEVELOPMENT CO., LTD.; 福建省农科农业发展有限公司
Inventors: DAI WENXIAO; 戴文霄; YE DINGCHENG; 叶鼎承; RAO JIANMING; 饶建明

Title: GARBAGE TREATMENT MACHINE
Abstract: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a garbage treatment machine constituted so as to treat garbage using ceramics carrying microorganisms thereon, enhanced in the volume reducing ratio of garbage and small-sized as compared with a conventional garbage treatment apparatus.SOLUTION: The garbage treatment machine is equipped with a cylindrical rotary treatment tank having an inner surface resistance plate for treating charged organic matter such as garbage or the like, a support stand for holding a compression plate and a scraping plate, a garbage charging port, a treated residue receiving tank, a means for driving the rotary treatment tank, a garbage heating means, the blower means to the rotary treatment tank, the filter and deodorizing means provided to an exhaust port and the exhaust means from the rotary treatment tank. The rotary treatment tank is preferably inclined with respect to horizontality and the deodorizing means preferably has at least two kinds of different deodorant.COPYRIGHT: (C)2006,JPO&NCIPI
Applicants: KANKYO KIKI KAIHATSU:KK; 株式会社　環境機器開発; MASUTANI SEIKO KK; 桝谷精工株式会社
Inventors: OBARA TAKASHI; 小原　孝; MASUTANI TOSHIKAZU; 桝谷　壽員

Title: 单车行走跨池作业刮料式翻抛机
Abstract: 本实用新型涉及一种属于机械翻动抛洒设备技术领域的单车行走跨池作业刮料式翻抛机。它设有大车架，大车架可在窑池边缘的铁轨上前后移动，在大车架的上部设有小车架，小车架可在大车架上左右移动。在小车架上的主电机带动主动链轮，主动链轮通过刺板翻抛链带动从动链轮转动，在小车架上设有的提升滚筒通过钢丝绳可向上拉起翻抛链，这样刺板翻抛链将物料不断地从底部向上部翻起并可跨池作业。本实用新型很好地解决了制作有机肥时人工劳动强度大，有机肥发酵不均匀的技术问题。
Applicants: 辽宁元亨生物科技有限公司
Inventors: 蔡德贵; 王轶群; 孟凡东; 张明; 李经武; 李国坚

Title: 一种城市餐厨垃圾厌氧发酵沼渣好氧堆肥通风系统
Abstract: 本发明公开了一种城市餐厨垃圾厌氧发酵沼渣好氧堆肥通风系统，主要包括发酵罐以及一对结构相同的总进气管，一对所述总进气管安装于发酵罐上，本发明的有益效果是，该好氧堆肥通风系统结构新颖，使用方便，通过其上的总进气管以及供气机构组成一个空气压缩进气设备，使用空压机进气并利用温控组件对空气进行温度调节，使通入发酵罐内的空气温度适中，避免破坏好氧发酵的温度，同时在罐体底部设有翻搅机构从而对罐体底部的堆肥进行翻搅，使其内部的堆肥与空气充分接触，并且在发酵罐内设有角度调节结构，调整进气角度，使空气进气角度可调，从而针对堆肥的不同位置进行喷气，使空气与堆肥接触更加充分。
Applicants: CHONGQING UNIVERSITY; 重庆大学
Inventors: LIU ANPING; 刘安平; HUANG YINGZHOU; 黄映洲; SUN XIAONAN; 孙晓楠; YANG DONGXIA; 杨东侠; ZHANG XUANMEI; 张选梅; ZHANG XIN; 张欣; ZENG ZUGANG; 曾祖刚; HUANG ANSHOU; 黄安寿

Title: 一种便于堆肥的厨余垃圾处理装置
Abstract: 本实用新型公开了一种便于堆肥的厨余垃圾处理装置，包括箱体，所述箱体底部的中心处固定连接有第一电机，所述第一电机输出端的顶部贯穿至箱体的内腔并固定连接有固定架，所述固定架内腔两侧的中心处均固定连接有支撑板，所述固定架内腔两侧的顶部均固定连接有固定板，所述固定板的顶部镶嵌有螺纹套，所述螺纹套的内腔螺纹连接有螺纹杆。本实用新型通过放置网框、固定架、支撑腿、支撑板、固定板、螺纹杆、螺纹套、固定槽、连接板和压板的配合使用，能够对厨余垃圾进行粉碎和固液分离，使其方便用作堆肥材料，解决了现有的厨余垃圾处理装置处理后的垃圾不方便进行堆肥，造成了厨余垃圾无法进行二次利用，降低了环保性的问题。
Applicants: SICHUAN FUYILIAN INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CO., LTD.; 四川富亿联信息科技有限公司
Inventors: HE QUANJUN; 何泉均

Title: SOLAR PHOTOVOLTAIC TEMPORARY TOILET, CAPABLE OF SAVING THE ENERGY
Abstract: PURPOSE: A solar photovoltaic temporary toilet is provided to recycle resources as clean organic compost by cultivating effective microorganisms and supplying the microorganisms to excrement to be completely fermented. CONSTITUTION: A solar photovoltaic temporary toilet comprises: a lower structure frame(01); an upper part(02); a lightweight and firm part serving as a leg; a toilet(03) located on the top of the lower structure frame; a cover(05) through which excrement(04) is easily and conveniently taken out; a pipe(08) having holes at some distance from each other; the holes through which an effective microorganism diluted solution is sprayed to the excrement; and a storing chamber(44) storing excrement. ©KIPO 2009
Applicants: RYU, JAI HAN; HWANG, HWAN GI; NANODMS INC.; 류재한; 황환기; 나노디엠에스주식회사
Inventors: HWANG, HWAN GI; 황환기; RYU, JAI HAN; 류재한

Title: 有机固体废弃物水份调节高温好氧堆肥装置及方法
Abstract: 有机固体废弃物水份调节高温好氧堆肥装置及方法，它涉及一种有机固体废弃物堆肥装置及方法。本发明解决了现有的仓式强制通风堆肥过程中的堆体含水率上下分布不均，影响了堆肥产品的质量的问题，现有的调节含水率的方式存在设备复杂和成本高的缺陷。本发明的装置的锥形仓顶安装在发酵仓的上端面上，环形集水槽设置在发酵仓内，多个布水器均设置在发酵仓内，进水管的上端与环形集水槽连通，出水管的下端与布水管连通；本发明的方法步骤：混合有机固体废弃物与发酵调理剂，进行间歇通风，发酵过程中通过布水器对堆体进行布水，发酵第12～第15天，堆体温度降至40℃以下，堆体发酵过程结束。本发明堆体含水率分布均匀，堆肥产品的质量好，成本低。
Applicants: Harbin Institute of Technology; 哈尔滨工业大学
Inventors: Li Weiguang; 李伟光; Zou Jinlin; 邹锦林; Ding Jie; 丁杰; Wang Ke; 王科

Title: HORIZONTAL PADDLE FERMENTATION DEVICE AND METHOD FOR OPERATING THE DEVICE
Abstract: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a horizontal paddle fermentation device which is stably operated regardless of the conditions of a raw material to be charged into a fermentaion tank as well as a method for operating the device. SOLUTION: The horizontal paddle fermentation device is composed of a horizontal fermentation tank 1 in which a raw material is stored and fermented into compost, a paddle stirring device 2 which stirs the raw material while cutting and moving it in a unidirection, a travelling device 3 for freely moving the paddle stirring device 2 inside the fermentation tank 1 and a traversing device 4 for moving the device 2 transversely. When the paddle stirring device 2 moves in a zigzag fashion, repetitively traversing and traveling from a discharge opening 1b to a loading opening 1a of the fermentation tank 1 and reaches the sidewall part of the fermentation tank 1, an operating control mechanism arranged moves the device 2 transversely in a reverse direction (c) within the width of the device 2 at the specified position (b). A specified position where the device 2 is moved transversely in the reverse direction (c) can be decided based on a value obtained by detecting and estimating the loaded condition of the stirring device 2 electrically, mechanically and physically.COPYRIGHT: (C)2001,JPO
Applicants: EBARA CORP; 株式会社荏原製作所
Inventors: NOMOTO MASAO; 野本　正雄; KURIO TETSUYA; 栗生　哲也

Title: TREATMENT METHOD FOR SLUDGE
Abstract: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a treatment method for sludge which creates an organic carbon source for denitrification from the sludge by using ozone, decreases the amount of the sludge to be discharged and allows the effective utilization of resources in combined treatment of night soil and septic tank sludge and methane fermentation sludge of organic liquid wastes. SOLUTION: The liquid mixture of the night soil and septic tank sludge is treated in a biological treatment stage 3 including a denitrification stage. Excess sludge generated in this biological treatment is reacted with ozone in an ozone reacting vessel 7 and the ozone treated sludge is subjected to solid- liquid separation to a separated liquid and separated sludge by a dewatering device 8. The separated liquid is returned to the biological treatment process stage 1 and is used as the organic carbon source of the denitrification stage. The separated sludge is composed.COPYRIGHT: (C)2001,JPO
Applicants: KUBOTA CORP; 株式会社クボタ
Inventors: MADOKORO TAKETOSHI; 間處　威俊; OBA SHINJI; 大庭　真治; FUJITA TOMOKO; 藤田　智子; OSHIMA HIDEHARU; 大島　秀晴

Title: HIGHLY EFFICIENT AEROBIC FERMENTATION OF ORGANIC WASTE
Abstract: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a method by which organic waste can be fermented at a high rate and with high efficiency.SOLUTION: In this method, at the time of controlling the fermentation process in a complete mixing type fermenter capable of fermenting charged organic waste while completely mixing the organic waste, change in water content of each of different kinds of organic waste having different properties from each other, in the fermentation process is measured to predetermine a timewise water content change point at which the water content reaches a lower limit value. In the process of fermentation of organic waste 13 that is an object to be treated, the fermenter is replenished with hot water 16 at the timewise water content change point to maintain the water content of a material 15 being fermented in the fermenter, at an adequate level for the fermentation.COPYRIGHT: (C)2000,JPO
Applicants: KUBOTA CORP; 株式会社クボタ; HAYAMIZU YASUO; 速水　靖夫
Inventors: UENO SUSUMU; 上野　将; MORO MASASHI; 師　正史; SOEDA YUJI; 添田　祐二; YAMAMOTO TETSUYA; 山本　哲也; SHIBATA TOSHIYUKI; 柴田　敏行; HAYAMIZU YASUO; 速水　靖夫

Title: A composter
Abstract: A composter for producing compost from household and other types of waste material, the composter being adapted to stand upright and including a side wall that defines a compost-forming space, the side wall including at least one region having an outer panel and an inner panel having a gap therebetween for air flow from outside the composter to enter through the gap into the compost forming space, also including an aerator for aerating the compostable material and at least one divider for partitioning the compost forming space into at least two vertically spaced regions to control moisture and/or heat distribution between the spaced regions.
Applicants: Cloud IP Pty Ltd
Inventors: Morrison, Michael

Title: 翻抛机支架用连接工装
Abstract: 本实用新型涉及一种翻抛机支架用连接工装，翻抛机包含有支架主体（1），所述支架主体（1）顶部设置有驾驶室（2），底部设置有履带行走机构（3）和翻料机构（4），支架主体（1）包含有前后平行对称设置的两块主架板（1.1），两块主架板（1.1）之间通过连接板（1.2）相连，主架板（1.1）上设置有多个连接定位孔（1.1.1），连接定位孔（1.1.1）上通过定位法兰（1.1.2）连接有定位螺母（1.1.3），前后两块主架板（1.1）相对应的定位螺母（1.1.3）之间连接有调节轴（1.1.4），调节轴（1.1.4）的两端均设置有外螺纹，调节轴（1.1.4）的两端的外螺纹分别旋置于前后两块主架板（1.1）上的定位螺母（1.1.3）的内螺纹中。本实用新型一种翻抛机支架用连接工装，安装精度高。
Applicants: 江阴市联业生物科技有限公司
Inventors: 陆建明; 曾淑华; 沈其荣

Title: 大型发酵池全自动循环翻抛机及其翻抛方法
Abstract: 本发明涉及一种大型发酵池全自动循环翻抛机及其翻抛方法，属于农用机械设备制造技术领域，包括大型发酵池，PLC控制系统、横向传动机构、纵向传动机构和翻抛机主体，其中，纵向传动机构固定置于大型发酵池的两侧，在翻抛装置上设置有在翻抛机架走位变向时可使翻抛装置相对翻抛机架上下运动的升降装置，所述的PLC控制系统分别与横向传动机构、纵向传动机构、翻抛电机和升降装置电连接；PLC控制系统在数据编程后对翻抛装置进行动力控制使翻抛装置呈“长城形”进行走位，当翻抛装置走位至终点后自动复位至原点形成一个自动循环系统，其针对大型发酵池自动循环翻抛机具有能耗低、翻抛效率高且翻抛质量高的优点。
Applicants: ZHEJIANG JIECHENG WASTEWATER TREATMENT CO., LTD.
Inventors: YE CHENGHONG

Title: Maquina para la fabricación industrial de biofertilizantes basados en te de compost y sus derivados.
Abstract: Machine for industrial manufacture of biofertilizers based on compost tea and its derivatives characterized by having a processing tank (1) in which the drain pipes (14) are placed, an aeration system that optimizes the distribution of oxygen throughout the product in a homogeneous way by means of a system creating micron-bubbles of oxygen, a device of vertical oxygenation from bottom to top (13), another vertical aeration device from top to bottom (15), an electric grinder ( 16) and a pumping system to generate vortex effect. The machine also has a hermetic lid (22) for the manufacture of anaerobic biofertilizers to which an electric stirrer (27) can be connected. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
Applicants: RIZO SANCHEZ Ramón Francisco
Inventors: RIZO SANCHEZ Ramón Francisco

Title: 用于废弃有机物好氧发酵的液压双槽翻抛机及其运行方法
Abstract: 本发明公开了用于废弃有机物好氧发酵的液压双槽翻抛机及其运行方法，涉及液压双槽翻抛机技术领域，包括信息采集模块、一级处理模块，二级处理模块、三级处理模块和元件执行模块，本发明通过对生产有机化肥过程的信息采集，并通过对其的运行计算产生一级动态质量因子、二级动态质量因子和三级动态质量因子，从而分别产生对应的控制信号，从而实现智能控制物料的添加、环境的改变和部件的工作速率，从而达到最佳的有机化肥生产生成的条件，从而使本机器较为智能和人力简单操作的实现对有机化肥的持续高质量生产工作，解决传统机器智能化较低，生成的有机化肥不够稳定，无法持续，效率较低的问题。
Applicants: HENANWANFENG MACHINERY MANUFACTURING CO., LTD.; 河南万丰机械制造有限公司
Inventors: LIU WENWEI; 刘文伟; MA LIXIA; 马利霞; ZHAO GUOCHENG; 赵国成; LI YANJU; 李艳菊; YANG ZIXUN; 杨自勋

Title: HOUSEHOLD WET REFUSE STORING RECYCLING APPARATUS
Abstract: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a household storage-type recycling apparatus capable of maintaining temperature and maintaining oxygen, both necessary for fermentation, in order to solve the problem that household wet refuse has been converted to a compost by mixing with a fermentation germ, stirring for oxygen intake, and utilizing fermentation temperature of the wet refuse, however, occurrence of harmful insects, bad smell, and excess water content have been caused by poor temperature maintenance and poor oxygen maintenance.SOLUTION: The household wet refuge storing recycling apparatus is capable of maintaining temperature and oxygen, equipped at the lower part thereof with a long-shaped box containing a heater and at the upper part thereof with a fermentation tank which can be tilted. From the position provided with the heater, the fermentation tank is connected with a suction tube, and heated oxygen is sent to the fermentation tank by operating an exhaust fan, then evacuated. Wet refuse is stirred with a spatula-type tool. A compost can be taken out by tilting the fermentation tank.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1COPYRIGHT: (C)2018,JPO&INPIT
Applicants: KASHIMA TAKENORI; 鍛島　武則
Inventors: KASHIMA TAKENORI; 鍛島　武則

Title: 一种太阳能垃圾减量化处理设施
Abstract: 本实用新型公开了一种太阳能垃圾减量化处理设施，包括可分解垃圾降解室，可分解垃圾降解室包括垃圾入口，可分解垃圾降解室的地面上设置有渗滤液排放槽，渗滤液排放槽与蓄液池连通，可分解垃圾降解室的上方设置有渗滤液回淋管路，渗滤液回淋管路与回液斗连通，回液斗与加热器连接，可分解垃圾降解室的顶部中间设置有除臭装置，垃圾入口设置在除臭装置的一侧，除臭装置的另一侧设置太阳能板，太阳能板与加热器连接，其优点是太阳能板产生的电热供电给加热器，加热器对回斗液内的垃圾渗滤液进行加热，提升室内堆肥体的温度，保证微生物的生存环境并加快生化反应，加速有机物的发酵过程，同时杀灭有害微生物达到无害化处理。
Applicants: 宁波华晨环境工程有限公司
Inventors: 潘蔡叶

Title: Compost turns over machine of mixing
Abstract: The utility model discloses a compost turns over machine of mixing, including locomotive and manipulation platform, the manipulation platform connect and control has transverse rotational hinge, vertical pivot, qi of chong channel ascending adversely pipe and sprinkler, transverse rotational hinge passes through the transfer line and controls the platform to be connected, transverse rotational hinge and vertically be fixed with the screw blade in the pivot, sprinkler is located the transverse rotational hinge front portion, and the qi of chong channel ascending adversely pipe is connected to with sprinkler and is located handle on the high compression pump in the platform. This utility model have turn over pile effectual, reduce process flow, reduce work load, promote the advantage of fermentation process.
Applicants: SHANDONG SUNWAY LANDSCAPE TECHNOLOGY CO., LTD.
Inventors: WANG SHENG

Title: DOMESTIC GARBAGE FERMENTATION AND COMPOST MANUFACTURE SYSTEM
Abstract: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a fermentation and compost manufacturing system for domestic garbage by which the discharge of CO<SB POS="POST">2</SB> is reduced.SOLUTION: The domestic garbage is transferred from a collecting tank where the domestic garbage is collected to a crushing tank by a belt conveyer and mixed with pulverized paddy straw and pulverized to be liquefied. The liquefied material is poured into a box type container by inclining the crushing tank and transferred to a warmed air chamber by the belt conveyer to be fermented. The warmed air is supplied from a solar power generating and wind power generating combined device mounted on the roof and combustion amount in a boiler is reduced.COPYRIGHT: (C)2009,JPO&INPIT
Applicants: KAMETANI TOMOOKI; 亀谷　朋興
Inventors: KAMETANI TOMOOKI; 亀谷　朋興

Title: 一种植物萃取精华的补水面膜
Abstract: 本发明公开了一种植物萃取精华的补水面膜，属于面膜技术领域。补水面膜的制备方法如下：水、甘油、丙二醇、薄荷醇、1,2‑己二醇、柠檬酸、柠檬酸钠、丁二醇、白薇提取物、仙人掌提取物、库拉索芦荟提取物、卡波姆、小核菌胶、羟苯甲酯、三乙醇胺、挪威云杉叶提取物、二裂酵母发酵产物溶胞产物、苯甲酸钠、EDTA 二钠、肌肽、聚谷氨酸、3‑邻‑乙基抗坏血酸、龙舌兰茎提取物、乙酰基六肽‑8、苯氧乙醇、三肽‑1 铜、氢化蓖麻油、香精，放置冰箱中冷藏，其中水为去离子水；准备无纺布，并放置到无菌料液槽中，随后倒入原料，搅拌混合，接着进行静置，最后取出无纺布。工艺简单，制备的精华液具有较好的补水与抗衰老效果。
Applicants: 同芙集团(中国)股份有限公司
Inventors: 周振林; 庄丽娜

Title: 一种用于好氧发酵的发酵槽槽底出料装置
Abstract: 本实用新型公开了一种用于好氧发酵的发酵槽槽底出料装置，所涉及的出料装置包括一台刮板输送机，刮板输送机安装在发酵槽槽底末端开设的出料槽内，出料槽两端分别穿过发酵槽两侧的发酵槽槽壁，出料槽的槽壁和槽底满布耐磨塑料板，刮板输送机以底部刮泥的方式将出料槽内的物料输送出发酵槽。本实用新型的有益效果：结构简单，运行可靠，故障率低，占地小，无需检修通道，检维修简单方便，工作环境好。
Applicants: 王树岩
Inventors: 王树岩

Title: APPARATUS FOR TREATING FOOD WASTE AND EXTRACTING BIO-OIL CAPABLE OF EXTRACTING BIO-OIL FROM MIXTURE OBTAINED FROM THE FERMENTATION OF FOOD WASTE
Abstract: PURPOSE: An apparatus for treating food waste and extracting bio-oil is provided to reduce environmental pollution by completely eliminating bad odor and gas generated from an extracting process. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for treating food waste and extracting bio-oil includes a fermenting and drying unit(1), a pulverizing unit(2), a distilling tank(3), and a distilling column(4), a plurality of oil valves(44a to 44c), a plurality of oil transferring pipes(41a to 43a), oil tanks(5 to 7), a vacuum storing tank(8), a vacuum pump(81), and a centrifuge(9). A mixing wing is installed at the fermenting and drying unit and mixes food waste at low rate. An oxygen supplying unit and a deodorizer are arranged at the fermenting and drying unit. The distilling tank low temperature-based heats organic particles from the pulverizing unit and successively vaporizes and discharges vapor and oil. The oil valves are installed at the positions of the distilling column of different heights in order to discharge oil stored in the distilling column. The centrifuge centrifuges and refines oil which is stored in the vacuum storing tank. COPYRIGHT KIPO 2012
Inventors: BAE, DONG HO; 배동호; LIM, WON IM; 임원임

Title: 一种茉莉花翻堆机
Abstract: 本实用新型提出了一种茉莉花翻堆机，在机架的后侧设有扶手，在机架的前端设有挡板，在机架上设有旋转电机，在旋转电机下方设有带轮，带轮带动一根旋转细轴，旋转细轴穿过挡板的前侧连接一根旋转轴，旋转轴上安装有搅拌杆，搅拌杆交替设置在旋转轴上。其有益效果是：本装置结构简单，操作方便，能够有效适应较小的场地，也不需要额外的辅助装置。
Applicants: ZHENGZHOU UNIVERSITY OF LIGHT INDUSTRY; 郑州轻工业大学; FUJIAN CHUNLUN GROUP CO., LTD.; 福建春伦集团有限公司
Inventors: FU TIANLONG; 傅天龙; ZHANG JUNJIE; 张俊杰; RAO GENGHUI; 饶耿慧; GUO CHEN; 郭晨; CHEN NAN; 陈楠; TANG YAN; 唐艳; PENG SHANSHAN; 彭姗姗; LI SHUO; 李硕

Title: 一种无公害有机肥的制备方法
Abstract: 本发明公开了一种无公害有机肥的制备方法，属于有机肥加工技术领域。本发明的制备方法是把畜禽粪便、农作物废弃物分别经过风干和粉碎处理后，按重量百分比将70～85%的畜禽粪便和15～30%农作物废弃物混合，加入立式敞口发酵罐中，添加适量微生物菌种，将混合物料的水分控制在60～65%，在立式敞口发酵罐中进行有氧发酵5～8天，发酵温度在60～75℃，当混合物料已经充分发酵和腐熟，水分含量下降至30～35%，把混合物料送到二次发酵槽中堆放15～20天，堆肥腐熟，制得无公害有机肥。该方法占地面积小、升温时间快、发酵温度高、发酵时间短、发酵完全、机械化程度高和基本不污染环境。
Applicants: 云南顺丰生物科技肥业开发有限公司
Inventors: 钟顺和; 罗南杰; 施志刚; 吕汉华

Title: Vorrichtung zur Herstellung von Kompost
Abstract: Bei einer Vorrichtung zur Herstellung von Kompost mit mindestens einer, vorzugsweise durch eine um ihre Längsachse rotierend antreibbare Siebtrommel (2) gebildeten Rottezelle für mittels einer Zerkleinerungseinrichtung (1) zerkleinertes Eingangsmaterial, wird dadurch eine ausgezeichnete Eignung für einen überprivaten Einsatz erreicht, daß der Ausgang der Rottezelle mit einer Ausbringeinrichtung (3) transportmäßig verbunden ist, die zumindest eine horizontale Förderrichtungskomponente aufweist und im Bereich ihres der Rottezelle zugewandten Endes um eine im wesentlichen vertikale Achse (a) schwenkbar angeordnet ist.
Applicants: Lescha Maschinenfabrik GmbH
Inventors: Kasberger, Peter, Dipl.-Ing. (FH), 8900 Augsburg, DE

Title: 无害化处理畜禽粪污的好氧发酵车间
Abstract: 本实用新型属于固体废弃物处理领域，尤其涉及一种无害化处理畜禽粪污的好氧发酵车间，包括全封闭日光温室发酵车间、好氧发酵翻抛机、发酵槽和排水系统；所述全封闭日光温室发酵车间包括对称设置的墙体，所述墙体上分别设有轨道，所述对称设置的墙体端部通过塑料膜和卷帘机封闭；所述好氧发酵翻抛机架设在对称布置的轨道上，并通过控制运行中的翻抛机位移来实现发酵物料的翻抛、移位、粉碎、菌剂接种、搅拌；本实用新型解决了禽畜粪污发酵占地面积大、投资多操作复杂等问题，而且本好氧发酵槽，伴随曝气装置和翻抛机翻抛，可以使固体有机废物在短时间内快速好氧发酵。
Applicants: TIANJIN JITIAN ENVIRONMENTAL TECHNOLOGY DEVELOPMENT CO., LTD.; 天津吉天环境科技发展有限公司
Inventors: LIN JINBAO; 林金宝

Title: Kompostieranlage
Abstract: Die Erfindung betrifft eine Anlage zur anaeroben und/oder aeroben Kompostierung von verrottbaren Stoffen, wie Biomüll, Grünschnitt, Hausmüll, Klärschlamm, verunreinigten Böden und ähnlichen Materialien.$A Die Aufgabe der Erfindung besteht darin, eine Anlage zur Kompostierung von verrottbaren Stoffen, wie Biomüll, Grünschnitt, Hausmüll, Klärschlamm, verunreinigten Böden und ähnlichen Materialien zu schaffen, die eine aerobe Kompostierung oder eine anaerobe Kompostierung oder eine aerobe und anaerobe Kompostierung in einer Anlage gestattet.$A Erfindungsgemäß wird die Aufgabe dadurch gelöst, daß die Kompostieranlage, welche aus einer geschlossenen, in mehrere Etagen unterteilten siloartigen Konstruktion mit in der Anlage angeordneten, den Rotteprozeß fördernden Einbauten sowie mindestens einer Ein- und einer Austragsöffnung besteht, wobei die Ein- und Ausgangsöffnungen gas- und flüssigkeitsdicht ausgelegt sind und Vorrichtungen zur Gasabsaugung und zur Schutzgasüberlagerung aufweisen.
Applicants: NOELL GMBH
Inventors: LEINEMANN CHRISTOPH; TIMMERMANN DIRK

Title: 一种翻堆机
Abstract: 本实用新型公开了一种翻堆机，属于发酵设备领域，主要解决目前翻堆机翻抛肥料效率低的问题。它包括导轨和桁架，桁架在车轮和驱动电机的驱动下可沿导轨平行移动；在所述桁架上可转动的安装一转轴，所述转轴横跨在两导轨之间，所述转轴一端由第一电机控制进行转动，在所述转轴上呈辐射状安装有若干排直杆，且在所述排直杆的末端安装有翻转爪。由于同时设置一个可调节角度的摆动板，对密度比较大的肥料摆动板在摆动的过程中可以自动调整该摆动板的角度，使该板与肥料的接触面积减少或者增大，并同时将块状的废料进行击碎，使较稠的肥料变松动，更有利于其他平板的翻抛。
Applicants: 章丘市宇龙机械有限公司
Inventors: 郭成军

Title: 有机肥翻堆机
Abstract: 本实用新型公开了一种有机肥翻堆机，包括横跨在发酵池上的行走车，所述行走车包括车架和车架下方的四个行走轮，所述四个行走轮成前后两排设置，前排两个行走轮以过盈连接方式安装在第一转轴两端，所述第一转轴由安装在车架上的电机驱动，所述第一转轴轴向均布有多个翻料机构，所述翻料机构由套于第一转轴外并与其一同旋转的轴套和轴套周向均布的多个搅拌爪组成。一台电机驱动行走轮行走和同时与行走轮共同旋转的第一转轴带动搅拌爪上下翻转，实现了一机两用，设备简单、控制方便。
Applicants: WUXI COUNTY MINGSHEN FERTILIZER CO., LTD.
Inventors: DU MINGSHEN

Title: 수직형비터 퇴비살포기제어방법
Abstract: 본 발명에서는 기존의 퇴비 살포기가 가지는 한계성을 극복하고자 하는 것으로, 첫째로 퇴비살포기의 용도를 퇴비살포기에서 농업용트레일러 겸용으로 사용할 수 있는 장치를 제공하는 것이다. 두 번째로 기존의 퇴비살포기의 회전반경을 작게하는 것입니다. 이를 위한 본 발명에서는 셔터 어셈블리(200)는 측부프레임(204)에 장착된 유압실린더에 의해 상기 셔터 어셈블리(200)가 상기 적재함(100)의 후단부를 개폐하게 설치되며, 상기 적재함의 하부 후단에 구비된 하부노치부(240)와 상기 수직형비터 퇴비살포장치의 외곽프래임의 하단의 하부홈부(230)가 결합되고, 상기 수직형비터 퇴비살포장치의 하단에 설치된 수직형비터 퇴비살포장치 고정노치가 결합되고, 상기 수직형비터 퇴비살포장치의 상단에는 상기 적재함의 상단에 구비된 상기 결합바(220) 및 이와 결합되는 후크(210)로 구성되어 상기 수직형비터 퇴비살포장치가 상기 적재함(100)과 분리 가능하게 결합되며, 동력전달부에 2단 베벨기어박스를 사용하는 특징으로 하는 수직형비터 퇴비살포장치를 제공한다. 상기와 같은 구성에 의하여 수직형비터 퇴비살포기와 농업용 트레일러를 겸할 수 있는 수직형비터 퇴비살포기를 제공하며, 기존의 유니버셜 조인트만을 사용한 퇴비살포기의 동력전달장치에서는 급선회 시 상기 유니버셜 조인트가 파쇄되는 문제를 완벽히 해결하였다.
Applicants: 주식회사 그린맥스
Inventors: 강대식

Title: 고효율 확장형 발효산소 공급장치
Abstract: 본 발명은 발효산소 공급장치에 관한 것으로, 더욱 상세하게는 교반기를 통한 교반 과정에서의 산기는 물론, 발효탱크의 바닥면으로부터 산소의 공급이 가능하게 하는 등 다방향 산기를 통한 산기 성능의 향상을 가져오게 하며, 또한 교반 과정에서 산기 노즐의 반복된 청소를 통해 그 산기 노즐이 막히는 것을 방지하여 안정된 산기 및 유지보수 횟수의 단축이 가능하게 하며, 또한 산기노즐 유닛을 구성함에 있어, 분리 구조를 이루게 구성함으로써, 발효탱크의 바닥면에 형성되어 상대적으로 슬러지가 흡착되기 쉬운 산기노즐 유닛에 대하여 간단한 분리를 통해 유지 관리가 매우 편리하게 하며, 또한 산기노즐 유닛의 산소 토출이 발효탱크의 바닥면을 향하게 구성함으로써, 발효탱크 바닥에 퇴비 원료가 침전되는 것이 방지되게 하기 위한 고효율 확장형 발효산소 공급장치에 관한 것이다.
Applicants: 임경열
Inventors: 임경열

Title: 연속식 주방폐기물 퇴비화장치
Abstract: 본 발명은 주방폐기물 저장탱크,주방폐기물 운송콘베이어,폐기물 처리탱크와 이 탱크내에 설치된 한쌍의 회전축과 미생물 운송콘베이어를 포함하는 폐기물 처리장치, 그리고 탈취장치로 구성되어 상기의 주방폐기물 저장탱크에 투입된 주방폐기물을 자동으로 퇴비화처리하는 연속식 주방폐기물 처리장치에 관한 것이다. 주방폐기물 처리탱크는 다수의 구획벽에 의해 여러 분해단계로 구획된다. 상기 회전축들은 폐기물을 혼합하여 전방으로 서서히 이동시켜 주는 다수의 혼합교반기와, 분해완료된 퇴비를 외부로 배출시키는 한편, 퇴비의 일부를 상기 미생물 운송콘베이어로 전달하는 하나의 스크래퍼를 구비하여 분해과정이 신속히 이루어지도록 함과 동시에 초기운전시외에는 미생물 투입과정을 제거시킨 것이다. 또한, 탈취과정에 의해 악취가 제거된 공기만을 배출시키므로써 주위환경을 쾌적하게 유지시킨다.
Applicants: 신현수대진산업 주식회사
Inventors: 배재근; 신현수

Title: 사면녹화용 식생재의 혼합 및 분사장치
Abstract: 본 고안은 토목공사에 의한 신설도로나 조성한 부지 등의 사면, 정지공사에 의한 절토 또는 성토면의 일반 토양, 사질 토양은 물론 풍화암과 리핑암반지역 등의 암절개면에 환경친화적이며 지속적이고 강력한 접착력을 발휘하는 접착제와 발효볏짚, 화이버, 발효퇴비, 유기질 비료, 왕겨, 유기질 토양 등의 순수 자연소재에 각종 초목의 종자를 혼합하여 분사시켜 어떠한 경사면에도 원하는 두께로 토사의 유실없이 분사시켜 붙일 수 있도록 한 식생재 혼합 및 분사장치에 관한 것으로, 이를 위하여 동력발생기(1), 콤프레셔(2), 변속기(3), 전자클러치(4), 소정용적의 식생재 혼합탱크(5), 혼합기(6), 유도관(7), 바이패스관(8), 모노펌프(9), 플렉시블 호스(10), 에어호스(11), 분사노즐(12) 및 제어반(13)으로 구성하였다.
Applicants: 허태학삼성에버랜드 주식회사

Title: 축산분뇨의 유기질 비료화 시스템
Abstract: 본 고안은 축산분뇨의 유기질 비료화 시스템에 관한 것으로서, 돼지등과 같은 가축이 사육되고 있는 축사(50)에서 발생된 분뇨(40)가 세척수와 함께 슬러리저장탱크(10)로 유입 보관되는 저장단계(100)와, 상기 슬러리저장탱크(10)로 유입 보관되어 있는 분뇨(40)를 펌프(11)를 이용해 퍼올려 고액분리기(20)에 의해 고체 및 액체 상태로 분리하는 고액분리단계(200)와, 상기 고액분리기(20)에 의해 고체 및 액체로 분리된 분뇨(40)가 각기 고체퇴비발효장(35)과 액비발효저장탱크(30)로 공급되어 발효되는 발효단계(300)와를 거쳐 축산 분뇨(40)가 유기질 비료화 되도록 하여, 상기 축사(50)에서 발생되는 분뇨(40)를 고체상태인 비료와 액체상태인 액비로 분활하여 사용할 수 있게 되고, 상기 분뇨(40)를 발효시에도 암모니아나 메탄등의 가스가 발생하지 않게 됨으로서 악취가 발생하지 않게 됨은 물론, 상기 분뇨(40)에 의해 토양등이 오염되는 것이 미연에 방지되도록 하는 것이다.
Inventors: 김유일

Title: 음식물류 폐기물 및 하수 슬러지 액상 발효처리장치
Abstract: 본 고안은 음식물류 폐기물 및 하수 슬러지 액상 발효처리장치에 관한 것으로, 특히 보온부재(11)와 재킷(12)이 설치되며, 투시창(13a)이 구비된 뚜껑체(13b)를 갖는 맨홀(13)이 설치되고, 내부에는 사다리(15)가 설치되며, 상면 일측에는 보충수투입구(14), 내용물 투입구(19), 세척수 투입구(20) 및 스페어 노즐(10)이 설치되고, 내주면에는 수개의 배플판(16)이 설치된 소정용적의 원통형 탱크(1)와; 수개의 다리(18)와; 탱크내로 투입되는 내용물을 가열시켜 주는 두개 이상의 온수 코일(2)과; 내용물에 회전력을 발생시켜 주는 기어드 모터(3)와; 기어드 모터(3)에 부응하여 회전되는 샤프트(4)와; 음식물류 폐기물나 하수 슬러지와 호기성 고온균 미생물이 잘 혼합되도록 하는 수개의 임펠러(41-43)와; 공기를 탱크(1)내의 내용물에 골고루 분산공급시켜 주는 에어 분사 노즐링(5a)(5b)과; 내용물 배출구(6)와; 수위검출센서(7a), 온도센서(7b) 및 온도메터(7c), 용존산소량 측정기(7d) 및 PH 측정기(7e), 배기용팬(8) 및 조명장치(9)로 구성하여 많은 량의 음식물류 폐기물나 하수 슬러지를 호기성 고온균 미생물을 통해 짧은 시간내에 발효시켜 지렁이 먹이로 생산할 수 있도록 하여, 음식물류 폐기물이나 하수 슬러지로 인한 환경오염을 미연에 방지할 수 있고, 이를 먹은 지렁이의 분변토를 퇴비, 상토, 토양 개량재 및 수처리제로 이용할 수 있게 한 것이다.
Inventors: 노성근

Title: 운반용 트레일러의 도어 고정장치
Abstract: 본 고안은 곡물이나 퇴비 또는 필요에 따라서 콤바인과 같은 농기계등을 운반할 수 있도록 운반탱크가 설치된 트레일러에서 특히 농기계등을 운반시에 개방되어 지는 도어를 유동없이 견고하게 고정시켜 운반이 원활하게 이루어질 수 있도록 그 구성을 후방으로 힌지결합되어 개폐되도록 도어가 설치되는 운반탱크를 구비한 통상의 운반용 트레일러에 있어서, 상기 도어가 개방되어 지는 운반탱크의 일측면 밑면에 외측면으로 다수의 고정공이 형성되어 고정결합되는 고정관부재와; 상기 고정관부재 내로 삽입되어 슬라이딩되며 외주면에는 다수의 고정홈이 형성된 삽입봉부가 형성되고, 상기 삽입봉부의 일단에는 상기 도어의 밑단이 끼워지도록 양측으로 격판이 형성되어 삽입부가 형성된 고정부재를 구비하여서 된 것을 특징으로 하는 운반용 트레일러의 도어 고정장치에 관한 것이다.
Inventors: 서정철

Title: 고효율 확장형 발효산소 공급장치
Abstract: 본 발명은 발효산소 공급장치에 관한 것으로, 더욱 상세하게는 교반기를 통한 교반 과정에서의 산기는 물론, 발효탱크의 바닥면으로부터 산소의 공급이 가능하게 하는 등 다방향 산기를 통한 산기 성능의 향상을 가져오게 하며, 또한 교반 과정에서 산기 노즐의 반복된 청소를 통해 그 산기 노즐이 막히는 것을 방지하여 안정된 산기 및 유지보수 횟수의 단축이 가능하게 하며, 또한 산기노즐 유닛을 구성함에 있어, 분리 구조를 이루게 구성함으로써, 발효탱크의 바닥면에 형성되어 상대적으로 슬러지가 흡착되기 쉬운 산기노즐 유닛에 대하여 간단한 분리를 통해 유지 관리가 매우 편리하게 하며, 또한 산기노즐 유닛의 산소 토출이 발효탱크의 바닥면을 향하게 구성함으로써, 발효탱크 바닥에 퇴비 원료가 침전되는 것이 방지되게 하기 위한 고효율 확장형 발효산소 공급장치에 관한 것이다.
Applicants: 임경열
Inventors: 임경열

Title: 축사용 분뇨의 교반과 액체와 분말 부숙제 살포 가능한 부숙장치
Abstract: 본 발명은 축사용 분뇨의 교반과 액체와 분말 부숙제 살포 가능한 부숙장치에 관한 것으로, 더욱 상세히게는 트렉터와 같은 동력 이동장치에 연결되어 축사용 분뇨를 정기적으로 교반시켜 부숙되도록 하고, 분뇨를 교반시키는 과정에서 액체를 분무하거나 분말을 살포하는 배출제어장치를 선택하여 설치할 수 있도록 함으로써 분뇨의 사용기간을 늘리고 부숙된 퇴비로 만들어 공급할 수 있도록 하는 축사용 분뇨의 교반과 액체와 분말 부숙제 살포 가능한 부숙장치에 관한 것이다.이러한 본 발명은 조인트축으로 동력이 연결되는 기어박스에서 교반 회전축에 교반날이 연결된 부숙장치로 이루어지고, 상기 부숙장치를 따라 이동하며 높이를 조절하면서 바닥을 향하여 경사게 설치되어 축사 바닥의 가축분뇨를 긁어 교반시키는 바닥 평탄화수단을 포함하며, 상기 부숙장치에서 액체 또는 분말 부숙제를 선택 공급하는 배출 제어장치로 이루어지되;상기 배출 제어장치는 일정한 간격으로 장공이 형성되는 급수 제어대로 이루어지고, 상기 장공에 설치되는 급수 연결축이 연결된 후 급수탱크의 하측으로 일정한 간격에 다수개의 급수밸브와 연결되어 회전 이동으로 한쪽에서 급수밸브를 개폐하며 다른 한쪽은 급수 연결축에 연결되어 급수 제어대의 수평 구동에 따라 급수량을 조절하는 급수 연결구를 포함하고;상기 급수 제어대의 한 부분에 연결축이 돌출되어 제어선의 선단이 연결되며, 상기 연결축과 일정한 간격을 두고 제어 설치대가 설치되어 연결축에 선단이 연결된 제어선의 다른 부분이 연결된 후 상기 제어 설치대에서 제어선을 구동하기 위한 제어부재가 기어박스의 일측에 설치한 구동레버와 연결되는 것을 포함하며;상기 급수 제어대의 한 부분에는 복귀 스프링의 한쪽 선단이 고정되고 상기 복귀 스프링의 다른쪽 선단은 급수탱크의 하측에 설치한 스프링 고정구에 연결되어 제어선으로 강제 이동한 급수 제어대의 이동력이 제어되면 복귀되도록 연결하는 것을 특징으로 하는 것이다.
Applicants: 김영석; 강원특별자치도 횡성군
Inventors: 김영석; 황원규; 홍석문; 서성희
